snippet: After reports of suspicious packages, at least one of which turned out to contain cornstarch, the authorities were sent to several hotels near MetLife Stadium.
lead_paragraph: After reports of suspicious packages, at least one of which turned out to contain cornstarch, the authorities were sent to several hotels near MetLife Stadium.

headline.main: Powder in Letters Near Super Bowl Site Is Not Hazardous, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Powder in Letters Near Super Bowl Site Is Not Hazardous, Authorities Say
